product.name: CLOUD SERVERS
product.title: Cloud Servers
product.author: Author 2
product.description: The next generation Cloud Servers powered by OpenStack is a fast, reliable, and scalable cloud compute solution. A more responsive API makes automating common tasks easier.

product.name: CLOUD FILES
product.title: Cloud Files
product.author: Author 2
product.description: Rackspace Cloud Files is an easy-to-use online object storage solution for files and media which can be delivered globally over Akamai's content delivery network (CDN).

product.name: CLOUD DATABASES
product.title: Cloud Databases
product.author: Author 2
product.description: High-performance MySQL databases in the cloud. Built-in redundancy and automated configuration are included so you don't have to manage these time-consuming tasks.

product.name: CLOUD LOADBALANCERS
product.title: Cloud Loadbalancers
product.author: Author 2
product.description: Get reliable failover for high-traffic sites and applications, with Rackspace load balancers for cloud and dedicated servers. If you add a managed service level, we'll also deploy and configure your load balancers for you.

product.name: CLOUD DNS
product.title: Cloud DNS
product.author: Author 2
product.description: Easily manage domains, subdomains, and DNS records using our API-based Cloud DNS platform. We can also configure DNS for your dedicated servers.

product.name: CLOUD MONITORING
product.title: Cloud Monitoring
product.author: Author 2
product.description: Our new Cloud Monitoring service lets you stay on top of your infrastructure by receiving alerts anytime your websites, ports, or protocols need attention. We also provide monitoring for dedicated servers.

product.name: CLOUD IDENTITY
product.title: Cloud Identity
product.author: Author 2
product.description: Authenticate and manage access to Rackspace cloud products through Cloud Identity.
